title: 进入服务器会断开连接提示如下QAQ求大佬帮忙~~
author: xiezhirouwoxifu
txt_content:
进入服务器后会闪退出来，提示：Internal Exception: io.netty.handler.codec.DecoderException: java.io.IOException: Bad compressed data format

求大神解答~~QWQ

replies.author: TRely
replies.txt_content:
更换你的java
建议使用java7
